TunableList.name: WORLD_DESCRIPTION_TUNING_MAP
TunableList.description: A mapping between Catalog world description and street tuning instance. This way we can find out what world description the current zone belongs to at runtime then grab its street tuning instance.

Tunable.name: Street
Tunable.description: Street Tuning instance. This is retrieved at runtime based on what the active zone's world description is.
